Quotes.author: Von R. Glitschka
Quotes.quote: The client may be king, but he's not the art director.

Quotes.author: Frank Capra
Quotes.quote: A hunch is creativity trying to tell you something.

Quotes.author: Steven Heller
Quotes.quote: As a profession, graphic designers have been shamefully remiss or ineffective about plying their craft for social or political betterment.

Quotes.author: - Abraham Lincoln
Quotes.quote: When I am getting ready to reason with a man, I spend one-third of my time thinking about myself and what I am going to say and two-thirds about him and what he is going to say.

Quotes.author: general douglas
Quotes.quote: A general is just as good or just as bad as the troops under his command make him.

Quotes.author: general stanley
Quotes.quote: There's likely a place in paradise for people who tried hard, but what really matters is succeeding. If that requires you to change, that's your mission.

Quotes.author: Winston Churchill
Quotes.quote: Courage is what it takes to stand up and speak; courage is also what it takes to sit down and listen.

Quotes.author: Ronald Reagen
Quotes.quote: The greatest leader is not necessarily the one who does the greatest things. He is the one that gets the people to do the greatest things.

Quotes.author: APJ Abdul Kalam Sir
Quotes.quote: You have to dream before your dreams can come true.

Quotes.author: Verse From Bhagwad Gita
Quotes.quote: We are kept from our goal not by obstacles but by a clear path to a lesser goal.

Quotes.author: Mahabharat
Quotes.quote: Many of life’s failures are people who did not realize how close they were to success when they gave up.

Quotes.author: Sanjaya
Quotes.quote: War causes destruction to all, it is sinful, it creates hell, it gives the same result in victory and defeat alike.

Quotes.author: Ashwasthwama
Quotes.quote: Passion, engagement, skill and policy – these are the means to accomplish objectives.

Quotes.author: Bhisma
Quotes.quote: Nobody is nobody’s friend, nobody is nobody’s wellwisher, persons become friends or enemies only from motives of interest.

Quotes.author: Mahabharat
Quotes.quote: No one who does good work will ever come to a bad end, either here or in the world to come

Quotes.author: Mahabharat
Quotes.quote: No one who does good work will ever come to a bad end, either here or in the world to come
